name: Proof Of Liquidity
description: Pool-X is an exchange that provides liquidity for staked crypto. It is a state of free market that enables the integration of diversified crypto assets and multi-node on the public chain. Users can trade the staked crypto assets in the platform and obtain liquidity. Furthermore, based on the nature of the Pool-X mechanism, the node can build up a connection with the Pool-X liquidity trading market to enhance its competitive strength and ultimately gather more node votes. Other types of staking digital assets will be progressively supported as the staking business matures.
